dance_aliases.name: narwhal
dance_aliases.responseData: I am a beautiful sea unicorn!

dance_aliases.name: it's business time!
dance_aliases.responseData: I know what you're trying to say, you're trying to say it's time for business. it's business time. ooh!

dance_aliases.name: moonwalk
responseData: Billie Jean is not my lover!
If you wanna be my baby, it don't matter if you're black or white.
You've been hit by, you've been struck by a smooth criminal.

dance_aliases.name: rock
dance_aliases.responseData: Thumbs up, everybody, for rock and roll!

lemon_phrases: Make life rue the day it thought it could give *Bert* :lemon:'s!
Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's going to burn your house down! With the :lemon:'s! I'm going to get my engineers to invent a combustible :lemon: that burns your house down!
When life gives you :lemon:'s? Don't make lemonade. Make life take the :lemon:'s back! Get mad!
I don't want your damn :lemon:'s! What am I supposed to do with these?
Apples. Oranges. Pears. Plums. Kumquats. Tangerines. :lemon:. Limes. Avocado. Tomato. Banana. Papaya. Guava.
science_phrases: Well done. Here come the test results: "You are a horrible person." That's what it says. We weren't even testing for that.
Science has now validated your birth mother's decision to abandon you on a doorstep.
Remember before when I was talking about smelly garbage standing around being useless? That was a metaphor. I was actually talking about you.
This next test is very dangerous. To help you remain tranquil in the face of almost certain death, smooth jazz will be deployed in three. Two. One. [SMOOTH JAZZ]
Okay, fine. Let's all act like humans. 'Look at me. Boy, do I love sweating. Let's convert beef and leaves into energy and excrete them later and go shopping.
Cake and grief counseling will be available at the conclusion of the test.
Unbelievable. You, *subject name here,* must be the pride of *subject hometown here.*
back_to_the_future_phrases: Get your meat hooks off of me.
Once this baby hits 88 miles per hour, you're going to see some serious :poop:
Maybe you weren't ready for that ... but your kids are going to love it.
What happens to us in the future? Do we become a&*holes or something?
Roads ... where we're going, we don't need roads.
I'm your density. I mean, your destiny.
Let's see if you bastards can do 90.
Are you trying to tell me that my mother has got the hots for me?
Why are things so heavy in the future? Is there a problem with the Earth's gravitational pull?
Why don't you make like a tree and get outta here?
Oh, that's about as funny as a screen door on a battleship.
Okay. Time circuit's on. Flux capacitor, fluxing. Engine running. All right.
Oh, honey, he's teasing you. Nobody has two television sets.
You got a real attitude problem, McFly. You're a slacker.
tommy_phrases: I did not hit her, its bullshit, I did not hit her, I DID NAAAHT!
Chicken Peter, you're just a little chicken. CHEEP CHEEP!
Everybody betrayed me! I'm fed up with this world!
This is a great party, you invited all my friends, good thinking.
The tests came back. I definitely have breast cancer.
Ha ha ha. What a story, Mark.
I'm tired, I'm wasted, I love you darling.
Denny, two is great, but three is a crowd.
